body:
Comment 4 by **zaczap**: 
There is an error in the above solution:

Should be:

1. Restart Mac OS in a single-user mode (holding 's' while restarting)
2. mount -uw /  # mounts the disk for writing
3. mv etc etc_bak  # just in case don't delete yet
4. ln -s /private/etc /etc  # restore the symbolic link
5. exit  # continue with the system's boot

(Difference is in step 4)
